title: 151. Restaurant Tech to Watch in 2021
description: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron sits down with Michael Schatzberg and Jimmy Frischling, the co-founders and managing partners of Branded Strategic Hospitality. Barron, Schatzberg, and Frischling explore how technology is changing the landscape of the restaurant and hospitality industry.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
